channel.title: Port Forwarding not working
channel.description: I've read many tutorials on how to port forward and ive followed all of them step by step. I have a no-ip accoutn and everything, set my port up in my firewall, thru my linksys, and it still doesnt allow others to join me. Does anybody have any idea on how to go about resolving this? Is there anything else i need to do or any other way to host it?

item.title: Port Forwarding not working
item.dc:creator: @darkincubus darkincubus
item.description:
@darkincubus wrote:

ok gimme a sec and ill try it, but i thought they had to be the same numbers?

and should it be tcp, udp, or both?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2008, 11:44:25 PM[/size][hr]nope, i tryed that and its still not connecting for others to get on, anyone have any other suggestions? i really want to host this server but it doesnt seem to wanna work for me
